message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the problem of recognizing human activities in videos, specifically in the context of Cricket videos. It proposes a solution that involves temporal segmentation and annotation of actions with semantic descriptions, using text-commentary available online. This involves the use of computer vision techniques for scene segmentation and classification of video-shots, as well as natural language processing techniques for classifying textual descriptions. Therefore, the most likely sub-category for this paper is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
